# endAngle

**Instance Property**

The angle at the end of the curve.

## Declaration

```swift
var endAngle: Measurement<UnitAngle> { get }
```

## Measuring a curve

- **startAngle**: An angle that begins the curve.
- **radius**: The radius of the curve.
